Name: Major Bailey #2
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: Made well this is a long, fruity, brilliant frozen Daquiri.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide, Revised .
Nutrition: One serving of Major Bailey #2 contains 238 calories
